definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Yes, many flying mounts are available, such as pegasus or griffins .
sentences.chinese: 有的，還有其他多種飛行坐騎，比如飛馬和獅鷲。

sentences.english: Pegasus is a famous winged horse of ancient times .
sentences.chinese: 飛馬是古代一匹有名的長着翅膀的馬。

sentences.english: Flying high in the autumn sky is the mythical winged horse Pegasus.
sentences.chinese: 翱翔在秋季夜空中的是神話中的飛馬星座。

sentences.english: The intension of Pegasus is to break with the image and appearance of current wheelchairs.
sentences.chinese: 飛馬的內涵是要打破目前的形象和輪椅的外觀。

sentences.english: Formidable hybrid of unicorn and Pegasus.
sentences.chinese: 獨角獸和飛馬令人生畏的混血。

definition: to soar/to rise high into the air
to move/to shift/to move out of the way/to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary

(martial arts) wind-and-fire wheel, weapon used in hand-to-hand fighting/(Daoism) a magical pair of wheels on which one can stand to ride at great speed, used by Nezha 哪吒[Ne2 zha5]/(fig.) never-ending treadmill
